original_text: One of Saul's servants was there that day. His name was Doeg. He came from Edom. He was the leader of Saul's shepherds. He was staying in Nob to make offerings to the Lord.
korean_text: 그 날에 사울의 신하 한 사람이 여호와 앞에 머물러 있었는데 그는 도엑이라 이름하는 에돔 사람이요 사울의 목자장이었더라

sentences.original_text: One of Saul's servants was there that day
sentences.korean_translation: 사울의 신하 중 한 사람이 그날 그곳에 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: He was the leader of Saul's shepherds
to make offerings to the Lord
